subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 25 points, 11 rebounds and 9 assists, leading the Cavaliers to a 79-68 victory in Detroit and a 3-0 lead in the first-round series.
snippet: LeBron James had 25 points, 11 rebounds and 9 assists, leading the Cavaliers to a 79-68 victory in Detroit and a 3-0 lead in the first-round series.
